item.description:
OK, That was a pretty lame name for a meetup but it's the best I could come up with. I hope you'll join us at 8PM for dinner. Check out the menu here, http://www.bespokenew... , and then come and join us. We plan on meeting earlier at 6:30PM for drinks at "Downtown at the Taft" http://www.downtownat... . So if you want to join us for a drink that would be great. This restaurtant is in demand so we must give them a final headcount on Nov 11th. If you RSVP "yes" please make every effort to let us know before the 11th if your plans change.
The menu will be posted here soon but this is a fixed price restaurant. For $29 per person you'll get Appetizer, Entree and desert. So sign up early, this is going to be popular I think. I am looking forward to seeing everyone and to hopefully meeting some of our new members.
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask for the "dining out group"

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Bespoke, We'll Bethere, Because, we Becool - Join us
